Description: Mk3 is the biggest and the most versatile series in the entire BC Rich catalog. Bolt-on construction, stock hardware, and BC Rich`s own pickups are main features of this super-affordable series. Mk3 Jr. V was inspired by the recent BC Rich V models, taking a lot from them. Under the hood, this mighty V features a solid mahogany body (multi-part construction, beveled edges), maple neck (four-bolt joint, fast contour), and rosewood fingerboard (24 jumbo frets, diamond inlays, 1.65" locking nut, 13.75" radius). Main hardware & electronics options include a licensed Floyd Rose bridge, die-cast tuners, and BC Rich pickups. This guitar has many cosmetic flaws. When I got it, it had apparently been damaged in the shipping process. It has what looks to be just a paint deep crack on the bottom side of the body where the neck fits in. It also has a crack that goes from the back of the headstock to the front, from the back of the A string tuning peg to the front of it. Also, the tip of the headstock is chipped, and so is the tip of the top body wing. Other than that, she’s perfect!🤣🤣🤣 I don’t have the whammy bar for it and it comes with a gig bag but the zippers broke so it doesn’t close. 🤷🏻‍♂️On Dec-13-18 at 16:08:55 PST, seller added the following information: I apologize, I fixed the zipper to the gig bag, but it should definitely be used carefully.
Title: B.C. Rich MK3 Jr. V White w/Black Bevels
